title: Ex plat player now s4 LF support main to climb with.
body:
Was plat 5 2 seasons ago and haven't really played a lot of solo because it's pretty boring playing by yourself and playing with players who don't main support and get stuck with the role is incredible frustrating sometimes. Looking for a support main to duo the bot lane who knows what they're doing and hopefully we can climb while having fun as well.  looking for an aggressive support who will make plays and knows when to go in and back off/trades etc.  Looking for someone that tries to carry from a support role. :) {{champion:32}} 

Blue :)

replies.body: I'm a supp main in S4 as well trying to get through my promos for a second time, add me
